import React from 'react' import { selectFolderOpen, setFolderOpen } from '../Redux/appSlice' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import "./Taskbar.sass" import { RiFolder2Fill, RiFirefoxFill, RiBrushFill, RiBookletFill } from "react-icons/ri"; function Taskbar() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const folderOpen = useSelector(selectFolderOpen); return (
{ dispatch({ setFolderOpen: !folderOpen }) console.log(folderOpen) }} />
) } export default Taskbar
